definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: A narcissistic mother competes with her own child when it comes to seeking love and affection from her family, friends and caretakers.
sentences.chinese: 在任何場合一個自戀的母親都會和自己的孩子爭寵。

definition: to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
to rival sb for the affection of a man or woman/to be jealous of a rival in a love affair
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
display of severity immediately on taking office/(fig.) initial show of strength
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
